name: CSI Media
tagline: Award-Winning Web Design & Development Agency UK
description:
CSI Media is an award-winning web and software development agency who deliver world-class digital experiences.
Our focus is the design and development of custom digital solutions tailored to your requirements, from beautiful brochure websites to large-scale enterprise systems with complex functionality. We work with the latest CMSs including Umbraco, Magento, Shopify, Sitecore and WordPress, making sure to match your requirements with the best platform.
Over the past 21 years, our team of 35+ designers and developers have successfully delivered 100+ projects for companies in B2C and B2B markets across a diverse range of sectors including travel, retail, automotive, manufacturing and healthcare. This experience means that we can understand your unique and often very specific business requirements quite quickly. Contact us to discuss your project via email at enquiries@csimedia.net or call 0344 873 0073
